pageContext.claim: “I gave up my salary, I gave up. So, the President has paid. No – but nobody ever talks about it.”
pageContext.analysis: Numerous reports have documented that Trump has earned far more from his business dealings as president than the official salary of $400,000. "Just 60 customers with interests at stake before the Trump administration brought his family business nearly $12 million during the first two years of his presidency," The New York Times reported. "Almost all saw their interests advanced, in some fashion, by Mr. Trump or his government."
